Your personal WordPress Expert

Hi there. I’m coming from Nis, southeastern Serbia.

I made my first steps into web development world almost a year ago, by starting to code in HTML and CSS.

Now I’m here to learn using WordPress as most popular CMS engine for building sites today, and I hope I’m doing it the right way.

My CV Here

Creating Website

We’re here to build a new WordPress website.

Or refresh existing one.

We have a lot of tools like themes, builders and other plugins, or WooCommerce shop in order to make a superb contemporary site for personal or business use.

Maintenance and Management

I’m here for Your site changes, content publishing, new pages creation, redesign and other stuff.

So, You can keep eye on your own business and leave all the site stuff to the expert.

Speed & SEO

It’s important today that site is visible, fast, efficient and reliable.

We can implement various improvements for better usability, search engine and speed optimizations.

Troubleshooting

Error 500, error 404…

Well, no need to worry about it any more.

I can resolve or fix those and various other problems and errors like layout issues, plugin and theme conflicts and others, to keep the website always running smoothly.
